title: [Badlands, Ravine]
description: The ravine ends in a sheer wall of crumbling shale.  The slightest movement sends showers of rock cascading down to the floor of the ravine below.  A few tiny yellow flowers have sprung up on a ledge nearby, bringing some color to this otherwise dismal land.

The ravine ends in a sheer wall of crumbling shale.  The slightest movement sends showers of rock cascading down to the floor of the ravine below.  A few tiny flowers, pale yellow in the moonlight, have sprung up on a ledge nearby, bringing some color to this otherwise dismal land.
